 <script type="text/javascript">
                if (!globalsearchformaction) {
                    var globalsearchformaction = "";
                }
                var defaultQuery = "ÇëÊäÈë²éÑ¯´Ê";
                var manulQuery = "ÂíÔÆ»ñÓ¢¹úÊ×ÏàÈÎÃü";
                var tabIdx = 2,
                    tagtitle = getObject('tag_title'),
                    tagItems = getObject('tag_items'),
                    tagtitleTimer,
                    tagItemsTimer;
                function tagInit(){
                    tagtitle.onmouseover = function(){
                        if(tagItemsTimer){
                            //console.log('tagtitle.onmouseover')
                            clearTimeout(tagItemsTimer);
                            tagItemsTimer = null;
                        }
                        openItemList();
                    }
                    tagtitle.onmouseout = function(){
                        tagtitleTimer = setTimeout(function(){
                            closeItemList();
                        },100)
                    }
                    tagItems.onmouseover = function(){
                        if(tagtitleTimer){
                            clearTimeout(tagtitleTimer);
                            tagtitleTimer = null;
                        }
                        if(tagItemsTimer){
                            clearTimeout(tagItemsTimer);
                            tagItemsTimer = null;
                        }
                        openItemList();
                    }
                    tagItems.onmouseout = function(){
                            if(!tagItemsTimer){
                                tagItemsTimer = setTimeout(function(){
                                    closeItemList();
                                },100)
                            }
                    }
                }
                tagInit();
                function showTag(n) {
                    tabIdx = n;
                    var hasContent = 1;
                    for (var i = 1; i <= 8; i++) {
                        if (i == n) {
                            //getObject("tag" + i).className = "tagThis hand";
                            tagtitle.innerHTML = getObject("tag" + i).innerHTML;
                            closeItemList();
                            if (getObject("scontent" + i))getObject("scontent" + i).style.display = "";
                            else hasContent = 0;
                            switchSearch(n);
                            globalsearchformaction = document.searchform.action;
                        } else {
                            //getObject("tag" + i).className = "tagOut hand";
                            if (getObject("scontent" + i))getObject("scontent" + i).style.display = "none";
                        }
                    }
                    if (hasContent == 0) getObject("scontent2").style.display = "";
                }
 
                function closeItemList(){
                    tagItems.style.display = 'none';
                    tagtitle.className = 'tag-con';
                }
                function openItemList(){
                    tagItems.style.display = 'block';
                    tagtitle.className = 'tag-con tag-con-bg';
                }
 
                function transTag(n) {
                    if (getObject("tag" + n).className != "tagThis hand") {
                        getObject("tag" + n).className = "tagTrans hand";
                    }
                }
                function transTagOut(n) {
                    if (getObject("tag" + n).className != "tagThis hand") {
                        getObject("tag" + n).className = "tagOut hand";
                    }
                }
                function s(o) {
                    var w = getObject("searchform").query;
                    if (w.value.length > 0 && w.value != defaultQuery && w.value != manulQuery) {
                        var h = o.href;
                        var q = encodeURIComponent(w.value);
                        if (h.indexOf("kw=") > 0) {
                            o.href = h.replace(new RegExp("kw=[^&$]*"), "kw=" + q)
                        } else {
                            if (h.indexOf("?") > 0) {
                                o.href += "&kw=" + q
                            } else {
                                o.href += "?kw=" + q
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                ;

 <script type="text/javascript">
                var dhsubmit = false;
                var remQuery = "";
				var cursorPos = 0;
                
					getObject("searchform").query.value = manulQuery;
					//getObject("searchform").onblur();
                function erase(q) {
                    if (q.value == defaultQuery || q.value == manulQuery)q.value = '';
                    q.style.color = '#000';
                }
                function recovery(q) {
                    if (q.value == '') {
                        sf = getObject("searchform");
                        if (sf.action == "https://www.sogou.com/sohu")q.value = manulQuery;
                        else q.value = defaultQuery;
                        q.style.color = '#666';
                    }
                }
                function checkKw() {
                    var sf = getObject("searchform");
                    getObject("ast").value = parseInt(new Date().getTime() / 1000);
                    if (dhsubmit) {
                        dhsubmit = false;
                        return true;
                    }
                    if (globalsearchformaction != "") {
                        document.searchform.action = globalsearchformaction;
                    }
                    if (sf.action == "https://www.sogou.com/sohu") {
                        if (sf.query.value == manulQuery) {
                            sf.p.value = "sogou-inse-c5ab6cebaca97f71";
                            <!-- add ibm link -->
                            //window.open('http://goto.sogou.com/200902/c766b99502e6f8a6bc6fa312db6e1716.php');
                        }
                        else sf.p.value = "01040100";
                    }

                    var query = sf.query.value;
                    var URL;
                    if (sf.action == "http://map.sogou.com/new") {
                        if (query && query != defaultQuery) {
                            URL = sf.action + "/#lq=" + query;
                        } else {
                            URL = "http://map.sogou.com/";
                        }
                        window.open(URL);
                        return false;
                    }
                    if (query && query == defaultQuery) {
                        if (sf.action == "http://bbs.sogou.com/t")    sf.action = "http://bbs.sogou.com/";
                        if (sf.action == "http://mp3.sogou.com/music.so") sf.action = "http://mp3.sogou.com/sogou_phb/html/index.html";
                    }
                    if (query && query != defaultQuery) {
                        if (sf.action == "http://bbs.sogou.com/") sf.action = "http://bbs.sogou.com/t";
                        if (sf.action == "http://mp3.sogou.com/sogou_phb/html/index.html") sf.action = "http://mp3.sogou.com/music.so";
                    }
                    return true;
                }

                this.url = url || "";
                this.loadData();

            sAjaj.prototype = {
                loadData:function () {
                    var C;

                    if (C) {
                        document.body.removeChild(C);
                    }
                    C = document.createElement("SCRIPT");
                    C.src = this.url;
                    //C.charset = "utf-8";
                    document.body.appendChild(C);
                }

                            ali(auto)
                        }, 10);
                    }
                }

                function da(obj) {
                    if (obj) {
                        var inp = sug$(inputid);
                        var off = kb(inp);
                        var left = off[0];
                        var top = (off[1] + inp.offsetHeight);
                        if (sugLeft <= 0) {
                            left += sugLeft;
                            top += sugTop;
                        }
                        if (isIe) {
                            if (sugLeft <= 0)
                                left += 1;
                        }
                        obj.style.left = left + "px";
                        obj.style.top = top + "px";

                        if (sugWidth)
                            obj.style.width = sugWidth + "px";
                        else
                            obj.style.width = inp.offsetWidth + "px";
                    }
                }

//hide suggestion-s div
                function Wb() {
                    var hh = sug$('sugmaindivname');
                    if (hh && hh.style) {
                        hh.style.display = "none";
                        if (sug$('suggimg2'))
                            sug$('suggimg2').src = sug$('suggimg2').src.replace('up', 'down');
                        if (needIfm) {
                            sug$('inthefront').style.display = "none";
                        }
                    }
                }

//show hide suggestion-s div
                function onoff(th) {
                    th = th || sug$('suggimg2');
                    var hh = sug$('sugmaindivname');

                    if (hh && hh.style) {
                        if (th && th.src.indexOf('down.gif') > 0) {
                            sug$(inputid).focus();
                            getContent(sug$(inputid).value, true);
                        } else {
                            Wb();
                        }
                    }
                }

                this.onoff = onoff;

//key bind
                function kbd() {
                    var bt = new Date().getTime();
                    var keywordrand = Math.floor((Math.random()) * 10000);
                    var et = new Date().getTime();
                    if ((et - bt) < 500) {
                        var hh = sug$(inputid);
                        if (hh.addEventListener) {
                            hh.addEventListener('keydown', onlyNum, false);
                            hh.addEventListener('keyup', press, false);
                        } else if (hh.attachEvent) {
                            hh.attachEvent('onkeydown', onlyNum);
                            hh.attachEvent('onkeyup', press);
                        } else {
                            hh.onkeydown = onlyNum;
                            hh.onkeyup = press;
                        }
                    }
                }

                function handlelines(ls, ll, keywords, rr) {

                    if (datas)
                        datas = datas.split(", ");

                            if (isWeb) {

                        }
                        ll++;
                    }
                    return [hh, ll, hasWeb];
                }

                function handleContent(ee) {
                    ee = decodeURIComponent(ee.replace(/\+/g, " "));
                    oldresult = ee;
                    var ret = ee.split(';;&;;');
                    var hh;
                    var keywords = "";
                    cline = -1;
                    tlines = 0;
                    var hasWeb;

                    hh = '<div id="sugmaindivname2"  class="suggestion-s">';

                    if ((ret.length != 3)) {
                        hh += '<div class="menuintro-s">ÊäÈë²éÑ¯´Ê¼´ÔÚ´ËÏÔÊ¾ÖÇÄÜÌáÊ¾</div>';
                    } else {
                        keywords = ret[0].substring(ret[0].indexOf('[') + 1, ret[0].lastIndexOf(']'));
                        if (keywords)
                            keywords = keywords.split(", ");
                        else
                            keywords = [];

                        hh += '<ul class="menuitem-s">';
                        var si = 1;
                        if (revsd > 1) si = 2;
                        var reth = handlelines(ret[si], 0, keywords, si);
                        hh += reth[0];
                        hasWeb = reth[2];

                        reth = handlelines(ret[3 - si], reth[1], keywords, 3 - si);
                        hh += reth[0];
                        tlines = reth[1];

                        hh += '</ul>';
                        hh = hh.replace(/undefined/g, "");

                    }
                    hh += '<div class="menuswitch-s"><a onclick="sugCls.disableSug()" onmousedown="sugCls.reCursorPos()" class="menuoff-s">¹Ø±Õ</a>ËÑ¹·ÖÇÄÜÌáÊ¾</div>';
                    hh += '</div>';
                    if (sug$("sugmaindivname")) {
                        sug$("sugmaindivname").innerHTML = hh;
                        if (tlines == 0 && keywords.length > 0)
                            Wb();
                        else {
                            if (sug$("sugmaindivname").style.display == "none")
                                pingBack("show_s");
                            sug$("sugmaindivname").style.display = "block";

                            if (sug$('suggimg2'))
                                sug$('suggimg2').src = sug$('suggimg2').src.replace('down', 'up');
                            if (needIfm) {
                                sug$('inthefront').style.height = iframeHeight + "px";
                                sug$('inthefront').style.display = "block";
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                this.handleContent = handleContent;

                this.revs = function (th) {
                    if (revsd == 1)
                        revsd = 2;
                    else
                        revsd = 1;
                    handleContent(oldresult);
                }

                function getContent(keyword, showspace) {
                    //if !web return
                    if (globalsearchformaction.indexOf("www.sogou.com") == -1)
                        return;

                    if ($sForm.w)
                        $sForm.w.value = normalRid || 0;

                        if ((!showspace) && (keyword == "")) {
                            Wb();
                            SugPara['isSug'] = false;
                            return;
                        }

                        if (oqy.replace(/\s/g, "").replace(/ /g, "") && (oqy == keyword)) {
                            if (oldresult)
                                handleContent(oldresult);
                            return;
                        }
                        SugPara['isSug'] = false;

                        oqy = keyword;

                            try {
                                xmlhttp1.destroy();
                            } catch (e) {
                            }

                this.getContent = getContent;

//click one
                function cc(ss, aobj) {
                    aobj.href += "&_ast=" + Math.round(new Date().getTime() / 1000);
                    document.oncontextmenu = sdf;
                    var hh = sug$(inputid);
                    var tmp = "";
                    var cobj = sug$("keyword" + ss);

                    if (cobj)
                        tmp = cobj.getAttribute("keys").toLowerCase();
                    hh.value = tmp;
                    Wb();
                    hh.focus();

                    SugPara['isSug'] = true;
                    if (clickWeb(cobj) == "")
                        pingBack('sb');
                    SugPara['isSug'] = false;

                }

                this.cc = cc;

                function clickWeb(cobj) {
                    var web = "";
                    if (cobj)
                        web = cobj.getAttribute("web");
                    if (web) {
                        cline = 0;
                        pingBack("c_nav");
                        return web;
                    }
                    return "";
                }

                function kb(s) {
                    var x = 0;
                    var y = 0;
                    while (s) {
                        x += s.offsetLeft;
                        y += s.offsetTop;
                        s = s.offsetParent;
                    }
                    return [x, y];
                }

                this.ovo = function (cur) {
                    cline = cur;
                    for (var i = 0; i < tlines; i++) {
                        if (i == cur) {
                            sug$("keyword" + i).style.background = "#F1F1F1";
                        } else {
                            sug$("keyword" + i).style.background = "#ffffff";
                        }
                    }
                }

                function sdf(ev) {
                    ev = ev || window.event;
                    if (ev.preventDefault)
                        ev.preventDefault();
                    else
                        ev.returnValue = false;
                    if (ev.stopPropagation)
                        ev.stopPropagation();
                    else
                        ev.cancelBubble = true;
                }

                var bak;

                function press(ev) {

                    if (!SugPara['enableSug']) return;

                    ev = ev || window.event;
                    sdf(ev);
                    if ((ev.keyCode == 9) || (ev.keyCode == 38) || (ev.keyCode == 40))
                        return false;
                    else
                        bak = sug$(inputid).value;

                    if (ev.keyCode == 13 && submited) {
                        submited = false;
                        return false;
                    }

                    if (sug$(inputid).value == "")
                        enableSug = true;

                    getContent(sug$(inputid).value, false);
                }

                function onlyNum(ev) {
                    ev = ev || window.event;

                    if (ev.keyCode == 13) {
                        submited = true;
                        return;
                    }

                    if (!SugPara['enableSug']) return;
                    if (!enableSug) return;
                    if (!sug$("sugmaindivname"))return;
                    if (sug$("sugmaindivname").style.display == 'none')
                        return;

                    var tmp;
                    var clineObj;
                    if (ev.keyCode == 40 || ev.keyCode == 9) // key = down or key = tab
                    {
                        sdf(ev);
                        if (cline < tlines - 1) {
                            cline++;
                        } else if (cline == tlines - 1) {
                            cline = tlines;
                        } else {
                            cline = 0;
                        }

                    }
                    else if (ev.keyCode == 38)   //key= up
                    {
                        sdf(ev);
                        if (cline == -1)
                            cline = tlines;
                        if (cline >= 0) {
                            cline--;
                        }

                    }
                    if (ev.keyCode == 40 || ev.keyCode == 9 || ev.keyCode == 38) {
                        that.ovo(cline);
                        clineObj = sug$("keyword" + cline);

                            tmp = clineObj.getAttribute("keys").toLowerCase();

                        sug$(inputid).value = tmp;

                            SugPara['isSug'] = false;
                        } else if ($sForm.w) {
                            $sForm.w.value = suggestRid || 0;
                            SugPara['isSug'] = true;
                        }

                    }
                }

                var sugPings = new Array(); //ping back
                function pingBack(act) {
                    if (globalsearchformaction.indexOf("www.sogou.com") == -1)
                        return;
                    var s1 = "http://61.135.188.217:8080/c.jpg";
                    var s2 = "http://pb.sogou.com/sugg.gif";
                    var url = "?w=" + encodeURIComponent(sug$(inputid).value) + "&k=" + bak + "&type=" + sugType + "&s=";
                    if (SugPara['isSug'])
                        url += "t";
                    else
                        url += "f";

                    if (cline != -1)
                        url += "&cline=" + cline;
                    if (act)
                        url += "&act=" + act;
                    url += "&r=" + new Date().getSeconds();

                    var V = sugPings.length;
                    sugPings[V + 1] = new Image();
                    sugPings[V + 1].src = s2 + url;

                }

//disable sug
                function disableSug() {
                    Wb();
					setCaretPosition(document.getElementById('query'),cursorPos);
                    enableSug = false;
                    pingBack("dis");
                    return false;
                }

                this.disableSug = disableSug;
				function reCursorPos(){
					cursorPos = getCursortPosition(document.getElementById('query'));
				}
				this.reCursorPos = reCursorPos;
                function sug$(objName) {
                    if (document.getElementById)
                        return document.getElementById(objName);
                    else
                        return document.all[objName];
                }
				//
				function getCursortPosition(ctrl) {
					var CaretPos = 0;
					// IE Support
					if (document.selection) {
						ctrl.focus();
						var Sel = document.selection.createRange();
						Sel.moveStart('character', -ctrl.value.length);
						CaretPos = Sel.text.length;

					}
					// Firefox support
					else if (ctrl.selectionStart || ctrl.selectionStart == '0')
					CaretPos = ctrl.selectionStart;
					return (CaretPos);
				}
				//
				function setCaretPosition(ctrl, pos){
					if(ctrl.setSelectionRange)
					{
						ctrl.focus();
						ctrl.setSelectionRange(pos,pos);
					}
					else if (ctrl.createTextRange) {
						var range = ctrl.createTextRange();
						range.collapse(true);
						range.moveEnd('character', pos);
						range.moveStart('character', pos);
						range.select();
					}
				}
            }();
            $sForm.query.onkeydown = sugCls.ali;
            var onoff = sugCls.onoff;

<script type="text/javascript">
	(function(){

		var startPic = getStartPos(),
			startOK = false;
		function getStartPos(){
			var hash = document.location.hash;
				hash = hash.substring(1);
			if(/img\d{1}/g.test(hash)){
				return /img(\d)/g.exec(hash)[1];
				//return hash.substring(3,4);
			}
		}
		function picRolling(){	
			var getUl=document.getElementById('pic-cont'),getLi=getUl.getElementsByTagName('li'),getImg=getUl.getElementsByTagName('img'),	
			getRight=document.getElementById('right-btn'),getLeft=document.getElementById('left-btn'),	
			timer=null, //Á¬Ðø¹ö¶¯µÄ¼ÆÊ±Æ÷	
			timer_one = null, //¹ö¶¯Ò»ÕÅÍ¼µÄ¼ÆÊ±Æ÷	
			shifting = 10, //¹ö¶¯µ¥Î»,Ò»´Î¹ö¶¯¶àÉÙ	
			speed = 5, //Ñ­»·¹ö¶¯µÄÐ¡Ê±¼ä¼ä¸ô	
			timer_out = null, //¹ö¶¯¹ý³ÌÖÐµÄÍ£¶Ù	
			ifMouseOver = false, //±êÖ¾Î»,Êó±êÊÇ·ñÐüÍ£	
			imgWidth = 190, //Í¼Æ¬¿í¶È	
			temp = 0,	
			newUlNode = document.createElement('ul'); //ÎªÈÃÍ¼Æ¬ÄÜÎÞ·ì¹ö¶¯,ÔÚÕâ×éÍ¼Æ¬ºóÃæÔÙ¸´ÖÆÒ»×éÍ¼Æ¬;	
			getUl.appendChild(newUlNode);	
			newUlNode.innerHTML = getUl.getElementsByTagName('ul')[0].innerHTML;	
			getUl.style.width = (getLi[0].offsetWidth)*getLi.length+'px'; //ÉèÖÃ¿ÉÏÔÊ¾µÄ¿í¶È·¶Î§	
			var ulWidth = getUl.offsetWidth;	
			if(startPic){
				var leftPicPos = -imgWidth*(startPic-1);
				getUl.style.left = leftPicPos+'px';
				temp = leftPicPos;
				setTimeout(function(){startOK = true},15000);
			}else{
				startOK = true;
			}
			timer_out = window.setTimeout(function(){timer=setInterval(roll,speed)},3000);	
			getRight.onclick=function(){ //µãÓÒ°´Å¥ºó,¹ö¶¯Ò»ÕÅÍ¼Æ¬	
				if(temp % imgWidth == 0){ //±£Ö¤¹ö¶¯ÍêÒ»ÕûÕÅÍ¼,Ò²¾ÍÊÇÔÚÖ»¹ö¶¯ÁË°ëÕÅÍ¼µÄÇé¿öÏÂ,²»´¥·¢°´Å¥	
					theShifting = 0 - shifting;	
					clearInterval(timer);	
					clearTimeout(timer_out);	
					timer_one = setInterval(rollOneTime,speed);	
				}		
				return false;	
			}	
			getRight.onmouseover = function(){	
				getRight.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "now-btn";	
				getLeft.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "now-btn";	
			}	
			getLeft.onmouseover = function(){	
				getRight.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "now-btn";	
				getLeft.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "now-btn";	
			}	
			getRight.onmouseout = function(){	
				getRight.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "";	
				getLeft.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "";	
			}	
			getLeft.onmouseout = function(){	
				getRight.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "";	
				getLeft.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "";	
			}	
			getLeft.onclick=function(){ //µã×ó°´Å¥ºó,¹ö¶¯Ò»ÕÅÍ¼Æ¬	
				if(temp % imgWidth == 0){ //±£Ö¤¹ö¶¯ÍêÒ»ÕûÕÅÍ¼,Ò²¾ÍÊÇÔÚÖ»¹ö¶¯ÁË°ëÕÅÍ¼µÄÇé¿öÏÂ,²»´¥·¢°´Å¥	
					theShifting = shifting;	
					clearInterval(timer);	
					clearTimeout(timer_out);	
					timer_one = setInterval(rollOneTime,speed);	
				}		
				return false;	
			}
			function rollOneTime(){  //×éÍ¼Ö»¹ö¶¯Ò»ÕÅÍ¼Æ¬µÄ¾àÀë,Ò²¾ÍÊÇÖ»¹ö¶¯Ò»ÕÅÍ¼Æ¬	
				clearInterval(timer);	
				clearTimeout(timer_out);	
				getUl.style.left = temp + theShifting + 'px';  //Ã¿´ÎÅ²¶¯theShifting¸öÏñËØ,temp¼ÇÂ¼ÁËoffsetLeftÖµ	
				temp = temp + theShifting; //temp¼ÇÂ¼ÁËoffsetLeftÖµ	
				if(temp % imgWidth == 0){ //±£Ö¤¹ö¶¯ÍêÒ»ÕûÕÅÍ¼	
					clearInterval(timer_one);	
					clearInterval(timer);	
					timer_out = window.setTimeout(function(){timer=setInterval(roll,speed)},3000); //±£Ö¤Í¼Õ¹Ê¾3ÃëºóÔÚÖ´ÐÐroll	
				}
				if(temp < -ulWidth/2){ //temp¼ÇÂ¼ÁËoffsetLeftÖµ,µ±Õû×éÍ¼Ïò×ó¶¼Å²¶¯ÍêÊ±,×éÍ¼ÖØÐÂ¶¨Î»leftÖµÎª0	
					getUl.style.left=0;	
					temp = 0;	
				}	
				if(temp > 0){ //µ±Õû×éÍ¼ÏòÓÒ¶¼Å²¶¯ÍêÊ±,×éÍ¼ÖØÐÂ¶¨Î»leftÖµ	
					getUl.style.left = -ulWidth/2+'px';	
					temp = -ulWidth/2;	
				}		
			}	
			function roll(){  //×éÍ¼Ñ­»·¹ö¶¯	
				if(!startOK){return};
				clearInterval(timer_one);	
				clearTimeout(timer_out);	
				theShifting = 0 - shifting;  //Ä¬ÈÏ×éÍ¼Ïò×ó¹ö¶¯	
				getUl.style.left = temp + theShifting+'px'; //Ã¿´ÎÅ²¶¯theShifting¸öÏñËØ,temp¼ÇÂ¼ÁËoffsetLeftÖµ	
				temp = temp + theShifting;  //temp¼ÇÂ¼ÁËoffsetLeftÖµ	
				if(temp % imgWidth == 0){ //±£Ö¤¹ö¶¯ÍêÒ»ÕûÕÅÍ¼	
					clearInterval(timer);	
					if(!ifMouseOver){	
						timer_out = window.setTimeout(function(){timer=setInterval(roll,speed)},3000); //±£Ö¤Í¼Õ¹Ê¾3ÃëºóÔÚÖ´ÐÐroll	
					}	
				}	
				if(temp<-ulWidth/2){  //temp¼ÇÂ¼ÁËoffsetLeftÖµ,µ±Õû×éÍ¼Ïò×ó¶¼Å²¶¯ÍêÊ±,×éÍ¼ÖØÐÂ¶¨Î»leftÖµÎª0	
					getUl.style.left=0;	
					temp = 0;	
				}	
				if(temp>0){ //µ±Õû×éÍ¼ÏòÓÒ¶¼Å²¶¯ÍêÊ±,×éÍ¼ÖØÐÂ¶¨Î»leftÖµ	
					getUl.style.left=-ulWidth/2+'px';	
					temp = -ulWidth/2;	
				}	
			}									
			for(var i=0; i<getLi.length; i++){   //±éÀúÃ¿ÕÅÍ¼,ÔÚÃ¿ÕÅÍ¼ÉÏ°ó¶¨mouseover,mouseoutÊÂ¼þ	
				getLi[i].onmouseover=function(){ //Êó±êÐüÍ£ÔÚÍ¼Æ¬ÉÏÊ±È¡Ïû¹ö¶¯	
					if(getUl.offsetLeft % imgWidth == 0){  //±£Ö¤¹ö¶¯ÍêÒ»ÕûÕÅÍ¼ÔÙÈ¡Ïû¹ö¶¯,±ÜÃâ³öÏÖÍ£ÁôÔÚ°ëÕÅÍ¼×´Ì¬	
						clearInterval(timer);	
						clearTimeout(timer_out);	
						getRight.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "now-btn";	
						getLeft.getElementsByTagName("a")[0].className = "now-btn";	
					}	
				}	
				getLi[i].onmouseout=function(){ //Êó±êÅ²³öÍ¼                         </div>

                                </div>
                                <div class="uni-blk-b SC_Order_Fix_Cont">
                                    <div tab-type="tab-cont" data-sudaclick="blk_health_1" blkclick="auto_nav" blktitle="å¥åº·">
		<div class="uni-blk-bt clearfix">

<li><a target="_blank" href="http://health.sina.com.cn/hc/2015-10-20/doc-ifxivsch3730681.shtml">å–èœ‚èœœæ°´æœ‰å¤§å¿Œ</a> <a target="_blank" href="http://health.sina.com.cn/hc/2015-10-20/doc-ifxivsce6955298.shtml">æ•™ä½ 6æ­¥æŽ’æ¯’æŠ¤è‚</a></li>

   
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://health.sina.com.cn/d/2015-10-20/doc-ifxiwazu5602725.shtml">è‚å¥½åçœ‹æ‰‹å°±çŸ¥</a> <a target="_blank" href="http://health.sina.com.cn/d/2015-10-20/doc-ifxivsce6932220.shtml">1ä¸ªå°ºå¯¸èƒ½é¢„å¯¿å‘½</a></li>

			<div class="blk-line"></div>
		<ul class="uni-blk-list02 list-a">

							function changeVmn(n){
								if (n == 0) {
									$("b1").className = "tvmn";
									$("tvmn1").className = "show";
									$("tvmn2").className = "hidden";
								}else{
									$("b1").className = "tvmn_1";
									$("tvmn1").className = "hidden";
									$("tvmn2").className = "show";
								}
							}

			<div class="fanfujubao" id="fanfujubao"><a target="_blank" href="http://www.12377.cn/">±©¿ÖÒôÊÓÆµ¾Ù±¨×¨Çø</a></div>
            <div class="fanfujubao1" style="display:none" id="fanfujubao1"><a target="_blank" href="http://news.sohu.com/s2013/fanfujubao/">ÍøÂç¼à¶½×¨Çø»¶Ó­¼à¶½ÈçÊµ¾Ù±¨</a></div>
			<div class="fanfujubao2" style="display:none" id="fanfujubao2"><a target="_blank" href="http://i2.itc.cn/20141216/26b_4594d163_880a_4ddc_d8a5_23b7ed2a23b3_1.jpg">Éç»áÖ÷ÒåºËÐÄ¼ÛÖµ¹Û</a></div>
			<div class="fanfujubao3" style="display:none" id="fanfujubao3"><a target="_blank" href="http://www.12377.cn/txt/2015-01/20/content_7622927.htm">Éç»áÖ÷ÒåºËÐÄ¼ÛÖµ¹Û</a></div>
            <script type="text/javascript">
var curIndex = 1,
    timeInterval = 5000;
function changeImg() {
    var obj = document.getElementById("fanfujubao");
    var obj1 = document.getElementById("fanfujubao1");
	var obj2 = document.getElementById("fanfujubao2");
	var obj3 = document.getElementById("fanfujubao3");
        curIndex = curIndex > 3?0:curIndex;
        if(curIndex == 0){
            obj.style.display = "";
            obj1.style.display = "none";
			obj2.style.display = "none";
			obj3.style.display = "none";
        }else if(curIndex == 1){
            obj.style.display = "none";
            obj1.style.display = "";
			obj2.style.display = "none";
			obj3.style.display = "none";
        }else if(curIndex == 2){
            obj.style.display = "none";
            obj1.style.display = "none";
			obj2.style.display = "";
			obj3.style.display = "none";
        }else{
		    obj.style.display = "none";
            obj1.style.display = "none";
			obj2.style.display = "none";
			obj3.style.display = "";
		}
        curIndex++;
}
setInterval(changeImg,timeInterval);
</script>

}
showTurnAD10(intTurnAD10);
}catch(e){}
</script>
</div></SOHUADCODE>
		</div>
		<div class="columnH">

                        window.blogsearch = function(fn,strName) {
                            if(fn.q.value==""||fn.q.value=="è¯·è¾“å…¥æŸ¥è¯¢è¯") {
                                fn.q.value="è¯·è¾“å…¥æŸ¥è¯¢è¯";
                                fn.q.focus();
                                return false
                            }

                                return false
                            }

                            return false
                        };

                                fn.k.value="è¯·è¾“å…¥æŸ¥è¯¢è¯";

                            if(fn.q.value==""||fn.q.value=="è¯·è¾“å…¥æŸ¥è¯¢è¯") {
                                fn.q.value="è¯·è¾“å…¥æŸ¥è¯¢è¯";

                        };
                    }
                });

img.__pObj = null; img.__isSL = null;img.src = img.getAttribute("data-src"); if(isIE6){return false;} } }, scroll: function() {if (this.status != "scrolling") {return }; var cache = 0; if (bH == d.body.scrollHeight) {cache = 1 } else {bH = d.body.scrollHeight }; var vh = Math.min(h.clientHeight, b.clientHeight); var vt = (w.pageYOffset || b.scrollTop || h.scrollTop) - Math.round(vh * (this.mult - 1) / 2); var vb = vt + Math.round(vh * ((this.mult - 1) / 2 + 1)); 						mtJS	= 'http://www.sina.com.cn/js/135/2013/ipmt/jiangxi.js';
                        break;

                    case 'æµ·å—':
						areaJS = 'http://www.sina.com.cn/js/67/sinaindex/2013/hainan.js';

                        if (city == 'é’å²›') { areaJS = 'http://www.sina.com.cn/js/67/sinaindex/2013/qd.js'; }
                        break;

                    case 'å¹¿è¥¿':
						areaJS = 'http://www.sina.com.cn/js/67/sinaindex/2013/gx.js';

                        break;

                        break;

                        break;

                        break;

                    default:

                        //areaJS = '';
                        break;

                if(autoJS){

                      url : autoJS,
                      charset:'gbk'
                    });

                      charset:'gbk'
                    });

                      charset:'gbk'
                    });

			function changetbbsmn(n){
				if (n == 0) {
					$("bbs1").className = "c1";
					$("bbsc01").style.display = "";
					$("bbsc02").style.display = "none";
				}else{
					$("bbs1").className = "c1_1";
					$("bbsc01").style.display = "none";
					$("bbsc02").style.display = "";
				}
			}

			var __citySearch = function(v){
				var r = "", cl = __citySN.arr.length, cs = __citySN.arr;
				
				for (var i = 0; i < cl; i++) {
					if (v == cs[i]) {
						return cs[i];
					}
				}
				for (var i = 0; i < __citySN.arr.length; i++) {
					if (v.substr(0, 4) == cs[i]) {
						return cs[i];
					}
				}
				return cs[0];
			};

                                               <div class="sele-frag sele-brand">
                                                        <div class="sele-now" id="select-brand">Ñ¡Æ·ÅÆ</div>

                                               <input type="hidden" id="pval" value="0" />
                                               <input type="hidden" id="mval" value="0">
                                               <input type="button" class="btn-inq" value="²éÑ¯" id="btn-sauto" />

                                     <style>.sele-frag{ z-index:500 }</style>
                                     <script type="text/javascript">
                                     void (function(window, document, undefined){
                                               //add 20130813 by @fzxa
                                               "use strict";
                                               
                                               function _$(id){
                                                        return document.getElementById(id);
                                               }
                                               
                                               var carBm = {
                                                        'bid' : 'brand',
                                                        'mid' : 'model',
                                                        'pb' : 'select-brand',
                                                        'mb' : 'select-model',
                                                        'phid' : 'pval',
                                                        'mhid' : 'mval',
                                                        'btn' : 'btn-sauto',
                                                        'dataUrl' : 'http://db.auto.sohu.com/attachment/js/new_model.js',
                                                        'searchUrl' : 'http://db.auto.sohu.com/search.at?suggest={KEYWORD}',
                                                        'dbUrl' : 'http://db.auto.sohu.com/model_{MID}/'
                                               };
                                               
                                               
                                               carBm.init = function(){
                                                        this.getBmData();
                                                        this.setBind();
                                               }
                                               
                                               
                                               carBm.setBind = function(){
                                               
                                                        var bEL = _$('brand'),
                                                                 mEL = _$('model'),
                                                                 pbEL = _$(this.pb),
                                                                 mbEL = _$(this.mb),
                                                                 btn = _$(this.btn),
                                                                 self = this;
                            
                                                        this.bind(bEL,'click', function(e){
                                                                 self.clearChild();
                                                                 var elem = e.target || e.srcElement;
                                                                 var pElem = elem.parentNode;
                                                                 var mid = pElem.getAttribute('data-id');
                                                                 
                                                                 self.setPselect(elem);
                                                                 self.getChild(mid);
                                                                 self.setText(mbEL,'ÇëÑ¡Ôñ');
                                                                 _$(self.mhid).value = 0;
                                                                 return false;
                                                        });
                                                        
                                                        this.bind(mEL, 'click', function(e){
                                                                 var elem = e.target || e.srcElement;
                                                                 var childElem = elem.childNodes;
                                                                 
                                                                 if(elem.nodeName == 'STRONG' || childElem[0].nodeName == 'STRONG'){
                                                                           return false;
                                                                 }
                                                                 var pElem = elem.parentNode;
                                                                 var mid = pElem.getAttribute('data-id');
                                                                 self.setText(_$(self.mb),elem.innerHTML.toString())
                                                                 self.setMselect(mid);
                                                                 carBm.close();
                                                                 return false;
                                                        });
                                                        
                                                        this.bind(pbEL, 'click', function(e){
                                                                 self.close();
                                                                 bEL.parentNode.style.display = '';
                                                                 return false;
                                                        });
                                                        
                                                        this.bind(mbEL, 'click', function(e){
                                                                 self.close();
                                                                 mEL.parentNode.style.display = '';
                                                                 return false;
                                                        });
                                                        
                                                        this.bind(btn , 'click', function(e){
                                                                 self.doSearch();
                                                        });
                                                        
                                                        this.bind(document, 'click', function(e){
                                                                 var elem = e.target || e.srcElement;
                                                                 if(elem.nodeName.toLowerCase() == 'body' || elem.nodeName.toLowerCase() == 'html'){
                                                                           self.close();
                                                                 }
                                                        });
                                               }
                                               
                                               
                                               carBm.doSearch = function(){
                                                        this.close();
                                                        
                                                        var _pval = _$(this.phid).value.toString(),
                                                                 _mval = _$(this.mhid).value.toString(),
                                                                 reditUrl = '';
                            
                                                        if(_pval == "0"){
                                                                 alert('ÇëÑ¡ÔñÆ·ÅÆ');
                                                                 return false;
                                                        }
                                               
                                                        if(_mval !== "0"){
                                                                 reditUrl = this.dbUrl.replace('{MID}',_mval);
                                                        }else{
                                                                 reditUrl = this.searchUrl.replace('{KEYWORD}',escape(_pval));
                                                        }
                                                        
                                                        window.open(reditUrl);
                                                        return false;
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.setPselect = function(EL){
                                                        var pText = EL.innerHTML.toString();
                                                        if(pText !== 'Ñ¡Æ·ÅÆ'){
                                                                 pText = pText.substring(2,pText.length);
                                                                 this.setText(_$(this.pb), pText);
                                                                 _$(this.phid).value = pText;
                                                        }else{
                                                                 this.setText(_$(this.pb), pText);
                                                                 _$(this.phid).value = 0;
                                                        }
                                                        _$(this.bid).parentNode.style.display = 'none';
                                                        return false;
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.setMselect = function(mid){
                                                        _$(this.mhid).value = mid;
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.getBmData = function(){
                                                        var self = this;
                                                        this.use(this.dataUrl, function(){
                                                                 self.getParent(brandMods);
                                                        });
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.getChild = function(mid){
                                                        
                                                        var i = 0,
                                                                 c = brandMods.length,
                                                                 data = brandMods,
                                                                 cnum = 0, //×ÓÀà
                                                                 cdata = '';
                            
                                                        for(; i<c; i++){
                                                                 if(data[i].i == mid){
                                                                           cdata = data[i].s;
                                                                           _getChildOption(cdata);
                                                                           break;
                                                                 }
                                                        }
                                                        
                                                        function _getChildOption(cdata){
                                                                 if(!cdata) return false;
                                                                 
                                                                 var k = 0;
                                                                 cnum = data[i].s.length;
                                                                 
                                                                 for(; k<cnum; k++){
                                                                           var childData = cdata[k],
                                                                                    childDataCount = childData.b.length,
                                                                                    childList = cdata[k].b,         //×Ó×éÊý¾Ý
                                                                                    optionGroup = childData.n,//option ×éÃû³Æ
                                                                                    pOption = '',
                                                                                    cOption = ''; 
                                                                                    
                                                                           pOption = document.createElement("li");
                                                                           pOption.innerHTML = '<a href="javascript:;"><strong>'+optionGroup+'</strong></a>';
                                                                           _$('model').appendChild(pOption);
                            
                                                                           for(var n = 0; n < childDataCount; n++){
                                                                                    cOption = document.createElement("li");
                                                                                    cOption.setAttribute('data-id',childList[n].i);
                                                                                    cOption.innerHTML = '<a href="javascript:;">'+childList[n].n+'</a>';
                                                                                    _$('model').appendChild(cOption);
                                                                           }
                                                                           
                                                                 }
                                                        }
                                               }
                                               
                            
                                               carBm.clearChild = function(){
                                                        var cElem = _$('model'),
                                                                 initLI = document.createElement("li");
                                                                 
                                                        _$('model').innerHTML = '';
                                                        initLI.innerHTML = '<a href="javascript:;">ÇëÑ¡Ôñ</a>';
                                                        initLI.setAttribute('data-id',0);
                                                        cElem.appendChild(initLI);
                                                        return false;
                                               }
                                               
                                               
                                               carBm.getParent = function(bmData){
                                                        
                                                        var i = 0, 
                                                                 c = bmData.length,
                                                                 n = '', // name
                                                                 d = 0;        // id
                            
                                                        for( ; i<c; i++){
                                                                 var eli = document.createElement("li");
                                                                 n = bmData[i].n;
                                                                 d = bmData[i].i;
                                                                 eli.setAttribute('data-id',d);
                                                                 eli.innerHTML= '<a href="javascript:;">'+n+'</a>';
                                                                 _$("brand").appendChild(eli);
                                                        }
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.close = function(){
                                                        _$('brand').parentNode.style.display = 'none';
                                                        _$('model').parentNode.style.display = 'none';
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.bind = function(obj, type, fun){
                                               
                                                        function addEvent(obj, type, fun){
                                                                 if (obj.addEventListener) {
                                                                           obj.addEventListener(type, fun);
                                                                           return true;
                                                                 } else if (obj.attachEvent) {
                                                                           return obj.attachEvent("on" + type, fun);
                                                                 } else {
                                                                           return false;
                                                                 };
                                                        }
                                                        addEvent(obj, type, fun);
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.setText = function(EL,txt){
                                                        if(document.all){   
                                                                  EL.innerText = txt;   
                                                        } else{   
                                                                 EL.textContent = txt;   
                                                        }  
                                               }
                                               
                                               carBm.use = function(js,func){
                                                        var script = document.createElement('script');
                                                        script.type='text/javascript';    
                                                        
                                                        if (script.readyState){ 
                                                        script.onreadystatechange = function(){   
                                                                 if(script.readyState == "loaded" || script.readyState == "complete"){     
                                                                           script.onreadystatechange = null; 
                                                                                                        func&&func();                              
                                                                             }
                                                                  };
                                                         }else {
                                                                   script.onload = function(){
                                                                                    func&&func(); 
                                                                   }
                                                         }  
                                                         script.src = js; 
                                                         document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);  
                                               }
                                               
                                               try{
                                                        carBm.init();
                                               }catch(e){}
                            
                                     })(this,this.document);
                            </script>

(function(){
    var item=SA.localcity.getItemByIpCode();
    if( item ){
        window.sohu_auto_ip_location=function(d1,d2){
			if(!d2){
				d1&&(document.getElementById("sa-autocontent2").innerHTML=d1);
			}else{
				document.getElementById('sa-auto-link1').innerHTML=d1;
				document.getElementById('sa-auto-link2').innerHTML=d2;
			}
        }
		var script = document.createElement('script');
		script.type = 'text/javascript';
		script.src = item.urls[0];
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);
		
		var script = document.createElement('script');
		script.type = 'text/javascript';
		script.src = item.urls[1];
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(script);
		
		document.getElementById('sa-tab2-link').href=item.url;
    }
	try{ new SA.BM(brandMods, 'sa-brand', 'sa-model', null); }catch(e){}
})();
function changeAutomn(n){
	if (n == 0) {
		$("sa-auto-tab").className = "titleB autotab_1";
		$("sa-autocontent1").className = "show";
		$("sa-autocontent2").className = "hidden";
		$("sa-autocontent3").className = "hidden";
	}else if(n == 1){
		$("sa-auto-tab").className = "titleB autotab_2";
		$("sa-autocontent1").className = "hidden";
		$("sa-autocontent2").className = "show";
		$("sa-autocontent3").className = "hidden";
	}else{
		$("sa-auto-tab").className = "titleB autotab_3";
		$("sa-autocontent1").className = "hidden";
		$("sa-autocontent2").className = "hidden";
		$("sa-autocontent3").className = "show";
	}
}
</script>

					img = null;

			function changeid(id) {
				var curclass="document.getElementById(id);"
				curclass.className="div_c hand";
				var num=id.substring(3);
				for (var i=0; i < 8; i++) {
					if (num == i) {
						continue;
					}
					var otherclass=document.getElementById("ad_" + i);
					otherclass.className="div_b hand";
				}
				innerhtml(num);
			}
			var classcount=8;//·ÖÀàÊý
			function innerhtml(crand) {
				var num=25;//Ã¿¸ö·ÖÀàÏÂ×î¶àÏÔÊ¾µÄÎÄ×ÖÁ´ÌõÊý
				var classrand=0;
				if (crand == null) {
					var now=new Date().getSeconds();
					classrand=parseInt(now) % classcount;
				} else {
					classrand=crand;
				}
				var defclass=document.getElementById("ad_" + classrand);
				defclass.className="div_c hand";
				var hotwords=eval("obj" + classrand);
				if (hotwords != null) {
					var size=hotwords.length;
					var innerstr='<form action="http://www.sogou.com/fuwu/more/' + provider_href[classrand] + '.html" target="_blank" name="skw" style="padding:0px;margin:0px;">';
					var ct=0;
					for (var i=0; i < size; i++) {
						if (ct == num) {
							break;
						}
						if (hotwords[i][0] != null) {
							innerstr += '<a href="http://www.sogou.com/web?query=' + hotwords[i][0] + '&p=' + hotwords[i][1] + '" target="_blank">' + hotwords[i][0] + '</a>';
							ct++;
						}
					}
					innerstr += '<span><a href="http://www.sogou.com" target="_blank">¸ü¶à&gt;&gt;</a></span></form>';
					var div_word=document.getElementById("div_word");
					if (div_word != null) {
						div_word.innerHTML=innerstr;
					}
				}
			}
			innerhtml();
